CustomField.description: This field is getting used in process builder "Actions from Account" to trigger the Rebate Invoice for Contractors. This field will get auto UNCHECK to avoid triggering more coop funds allocation. Another field "REBATE INVOICE Co-op $ Generated ?" will get an auto check when Rebate Invoice fund is allocated.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field will get auto UNCHECK to avoid triggering more coop funds allocation. Another field "REBATE INVOICE Co-op $ Generated ?" will get an auto check when Rebate Invoice fund is allocated.
CustomField.label: Generate REBATE INVOICE Co-Op $
